title: Experiment City
subtitle: Prefabricated houses for all kinds of people
p-1: The prefabricated house is a replicable design object, but also a critical –crucial– agent in the discourses of sustainability, affordability and innovative design. We propose the industrialized construction of a housing complex that incorporates productive and leisure spaces. A reflection is proposed on the house, its program, its dimensions, its organization, its capacity for reformulation and variation, growth or reduction of meters or height, the possibility of union, relationship of public-private limits.
p-2: It also raises a reflection on the rururban environment as a current field of work for the contemporary architect. In addition, research on complex programs in relation to the productive and domestic space, learning, conservation, accumulation.
